slots.description: Accepts a hero image to display at the top of the dialog
slots.name: hero

slots.description: Acts as the heading of the dialog. This should be an actual heading tag `<h1-6 />`
slots.name: heading

slots.description: Content not addressed to a specific slot will be interpreted as the main content of the dialog
Content addressed to the `footer` will be placed below the main content and to the side of any `[slot='button']` content
slots.name: footer

slots.description: Button elements addressed to this slot may be placed below the content when not delivered in a fullscreen mode
slots.name: button

events.name: close
events.description: Announces that the dialog has been closed.

members.name: getUpdateComplete
members.description:
Bind the open/close transition into the update complete lifecycle so
that the overlay system can wait for it to be "visibly ready" before
attempting to throw focus into the content contained herein. Not
waiting for this can cause small amounts of page scroll to happen
while opening the Tray when focusable content is included: e.g. Menu
elements whose selected Menu Item is not the first Menu Item.

events.name: secondary
events.description: Announces that the "secondary" button has been clicked.

events.name: cancel
events.description: Announces that the "cancel" button has been clicked.

events.name: confirm
events.description: Announces that the "confirm" button has been clicked.

events.name: close
events.description: Announces that the dialog has been closed.
